attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Daily Express or self pronounced "Worlds Greatest Newspaper" frequently write rubbish, and goes on about Princess Diana and immigrants in every issue. This newspaper makes absolutely no contribution to Journalism, the country or anything else and even employs Vanessa Feltz. The paper seems to exist for the soul purpose of Promoting Richard Desmond (The owners) ego, and we feel the Government should bad the Daily Express now.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
